talk.utter: Kamala also had stipulations on how she would debate. Her admin didn’t even want a live debate because they were so scared she’d mess up. Harris is not the candidate to choose again. talk.utter:
I’m merely pointing out that both candidates put stipulations on the debate. 

The second part was in response to the first post asking how did Kamala not win. It’s because she was the only option with the timeframe. With more time they could’ve ran someone who had a better shot at winning
